title: bEDavO brahma
sahitya:
bEDavO brahma drOha bEDavO


caraNam 1    hottihe narajanmavannu pAda sutti koNDihudallo nInu AhA
cittadoLage nODu uttama viprara vrttiya kaLedu unmattanAgalu bEDa
    caraNam 2    sUsuva nadiyalli biddu munde IsalArade muLugeddu AhA 
IsO kAyana biTTu bIsO kallane kaTTi Isuva teradi I bhUsurarA dravya
    caraNam 3    inneSTu pELali sAkSi bhrAhmarannava tegevana shikSi AhA 
pannaga shayana purandara viTTalanu benna biDade brAhmarannu kAdiruvanu
